item.description:
Come join us at Illusions Dance Club for their Thirsty Thursday!

Like to Dance? You've come to the right place. Illusions Dance Club & Restaurant has it all Mixed Music DJ Entertainment, Tv Sports, Mechanical Bull, 10 Pool Tables, Good Food, Cold Beverages.
Every Thursday night doors open @ 6:15 * DJ Louie & Walt Spinning out all your favorite music from Country , Top 40, Southern Rock , 80's , 90's .. All Ages are Welcome $3.00 Mixed Drinks all Night * $2.50 Bud or Bud Light all Night * Free Pool All Night * Full Food Menu Available * NO COVER BEFORE 7:30...$5.00 after that.
Prices for food are inexpensive!

We had this spot as a recommendation from one of our members...and it sounds terrific! So let's check it out...This also gives a break to some of you who live East of Danbury...

Multi-group meetup...Anyone else who'd like to post it, feel free!
item.name: Giving Ourselves Illusions !!!
